hello, 
 
a mobile warez site chain ( frendz.biz ) has taken shelter in your
servers. 
 
it has multiple other domain names like... 
howsthat.uk.to 
howsthet.uk.to 
howsthat.org 
howsthet.org 
howsthat.biz 
howsthet.biz 
& may be even more that am not aware of yet. 
 
please take a look at frendz.biz to confirm my accusition. 
 
at present you might be hosting one or even more sites of this chain.
please  
take appropriate action. 
 
thank you....
